About

Why hello there! I didn't see you.

I'm Austin. I live in San Francisco, and I've become one of those people who likes growing startups. I used to live in Oklahoma City, where I worked with a bunch of small business in the technology space. I spent some time as a GitHubber on their sales and support groups. I'm now at Fastly, the most legit CDN in the game, building out the support and SE teams.

You can find me as either ASpires or AustinSpires on most of the things. I tweet bad jokes, write bad code whenever I can, and spend way too much time cooking and "artisinally exploring" beer. You can email me at austinspires@gmail.com.
